title: Phase 1: Project Setup
description:
Initialize SvelteKit project, PostgreSQL + Drizzle ORM, Docker Compose configuration, and core dependencies.

**Key deliverables:**
- SvelteKit project with TypeScript
- PostgreSQL + Drizzle ORM schema
- Docker Compose (app, db, redis, ml-service)
- Dependencies: @atproto/oauth-client-node, @atproto/api, drizzle-orm, postgres, bullmq, ioredis, resend
close_reason: All Phase 1 tasks completed: SvelteKit project, Drizzle schema, Docker Compose, dependencies installed

title: Set up PostgreSQL + Drizzle ORM with schema
description:
Configure Drizzle ORM and create database schema:

**Tables:**
- users (did, handle, email, action_mode, toxicity_threshold, monitoring_enabled)
- flagged_users (owner_did, flagged_did, aggregate_toxicity_score, toxic_post_count, status)
- toxic_evidence (post_uri, post_text, toxicity_scores, primary_category, interaction_type)

Create `src/lib/db/schema.ts` with Drizzle schema definitions.
close_reason: Completed Phase 1 setup: Drizzle schema, Docker Compose, and core dependencies

title: Configure Docker Compose
description:
Create `docker-compose.yml` with services:
- app (SvelteKit)
- db (PostgreSQL)
- redis (for BullMQ)
- ml-service (Python FastAPI)

Include volume mounts, environment variables, and networking.
close_reason: Completed Phase 1 setup: Drizzle schema, Docker Compose, and core dependencies

title: Install core dependencies
description:
Install required npm packages:

```bash
npm install @atproto/oauth-client-node @atproto/api drizzle-orm postgres bullmq ioredis resend
npm install -D drizzle-kit @types/node
```
close_reason: Completed Phase 1 setup: Drizzle schema, Docker Compose, and core dependencies
